So it seems we just finished packaging our first line of budget VPS that can fit the LEB market that is new to us (as some of you already know).

The servers we are using for this service are robust HP recently replaced in one cluster with some bigger iron. 
They have 2 x Quad X5450  @ 3.00GHz and 32GB RAM.
VPS storage is carved out from a venerable 2Gbit FC storage, operating system run on the onboard sas controller. Gigabit connectivity.

We have 3 of these servers available for now. Let see how it works.
